column6: My place is close to public transport, the airport, the city center, parks, art and culture, across from Schlitterbahn, direct access to Comal River, and walking distance to all downtown New Braunfels has to offer.. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids).\n\nAdditional 7% Occupancy/Hotel Tax will apply to nightly rate. Once reservation is approved a \
